scripts.audit: npm audit fix && lerna-audit && lerna bootstrap
scripts.dev-0.x: npm run prepare:all && npm run start:dev && npm run dev -w docs-0.x
scripts.dev:docs-vuetify: npm run prepare:all && npm run start:dev && npm run dev -w docs-vuetify
scripts.dev:vue-cli: npm run start:dev && npm run dev -w dev-vue-cli
scripts.build:for-publish: npm run prepare:all && npm run start:build && lerna run build && lerna run build-example && npm run build:vue-int && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: build" && git push
scripts.build:favicon: copyfiles media/* packages/docs/public && npm run build:favicon -w docs-0.x
scripts.build-and-publish: npm run build:for-publish && npm run publish
scripts.publish:post: npm run start:dev && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: post-build" && git push
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build:for-publish && firebase deploy --only hosting && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: deploy" && git push && npm run publish:post
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:form && npm run prepare:table
scripts.dep:update-all: ncu --target minor -u && lerna exec 'ncu --target minor -u' && npm i
scripts.dep:reinstall-all: rimraf node_modules && lerna clean -y && npm i
